text: Amanage hunka Israeli vahera zamasamio, Mikozama Kegavama Hu'nea Ra Anumzamo'a amanage hie, antahiho, tamagrama ran tamagima enerita tamavesi tamavesima hunentaza mono noni'a eri haviza hugahue. Hagi ne' mofavre nagatamima, mofa'netamia zamatreta azage'zama Judama mani'naza mofavretmia bainati kazinteti zamahe vagaregahaze.
